item.title: Installing ALOT, ALOV, MEUITM, and other mods for Mass Effect on Linux
item.description: Introduction Valve’s Proton allows Steam users to run games that don’t have a native Linux implementation on their Linux machines. It’s amazing. Mass Effect is has a Gold rating on ProtonDB which means it runs well when using Proton, with minor adjustments. If you have the game on Origin or you have a physical copy, you can also play on Linux, but you’ll have to use Lutris or something similar instead.
